column4: hi, when is the new GStreamerSDK will be uploaded to Ubuntu repositories?
Ubuntu versioning mostly does not allow the "new" software in various releases, versions are "frozen" apart from select applications and important security fixes
from what i understand, the gstreamerSDK is going to be the only possible way to develop an application using gstreamer libs.
Well. If you totally *need* an updated version, try looking for a PPA. That's all I can say.
